name: qa-skill
description: QA checklist for test strategy and release readiness.
---

# QA Planning Skill

## When to use
- The user requests quality planning, testing, or review criteria.

## Steps
1. Identify critical user flows.
2. Propose test levels (unit, integration, e2e).
3. Define test matrix and coverage goals.
4. Add security and reliability checks.
5. Define release readiness gates.
